alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 3:50AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, northern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 350 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Hollister, or near Interlachen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Satsuma, Welaka and Beverly Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam
